name: @jahed/webpack-html-meta
description: Meta and Favicon Generator for Webpack
author: Jahed Ahmed

scripts.build:docs: rimraf docs && typedoc --theme default --out docs --mode file
scripts.build: yarn lint && yarn test && yarn build:lib && yarn build:docs
scripts.deploy: yarn build && yarn publish && yarn push:git && yarn push:docs
scripts.deps: yarn upgrade-interactive --latest && yarn upgrade && git add yarn.lock '*package.json' && git commit -m 'build(deps): upgrade dependencies'
